changelogversion.changelogtext: Clicking back button from the chat screen will now slide back to the friend list screen
Fix crash for devices on Ice Cream Sandwich when receiving a notification
Fix a bug where it sometimes crashes when coming back to the app after it being in the background for a while.
Change tabs name and show the team color in live game statistics.
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Add feature to view live game statistics!
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Add logout button to the navigation drawer
Optimize performance for screens with list view
Make the "i" button in your friend list larger on regular screens
Resize things in region selection and login screen for larger screens
Fix bugs where sometimes incoming messages don't show up
Fix Other small bugs and crashes
[b][font color=red]New![/font][/b] Add win rate pie graph to summoner's profile
Add fade in animation to friend list
Selected navigation drawer item now changes to a different text color
